Koreya Universitetlariga 100% gacha gran: Opportunity to Win Up to 100% Scholarship in Korean Universities
Janubiy Koreya hukumatining stipendiya d: The South Korean government’s scholarship program (GKS) provides the opportunity to receive a full scholarship and monthly stipend for undergraduate and graduate studies in Korea from the National Institute for International Education.
GKS granti sizga nima beradi: What Does the GKS Scholarship Provide?
- Dastur boshlanganida va tugaganida Kor: - Travel expenses to and from Korea are covered at the beginning and end of the program.
- Koreyaga yetib borganda joylashib olis: - A one-time allowance for settling in Korea is provided upon arrival. Amount - 200,000 Korean Won (approximately $157).
- Til kursi va universitetning kontrak t: - Language course and university contract fees are fully covered (only for master's and doctoral students)...

grant.title: Opportunity to Win Up to 100% Scholarships to Korean Universities
grant.gksDescription: The Korean Government's Scholarship Program (GKS) by the National Institute for International Education of Korea offers the opportunity to receive up to 100% full scholarship and monthly stipend for undergraduate and graduate studies in Korea
grant.gksBenefit1: Expenses for traveling to Korea at the beginning of the program and returning at the end are covered.
grant.gksBenefit2: A one-time settlement allowance is provided upon arrival in Korea. Amount - 200,000 Korean Won (approximately 157 USD).
grant.gksBenefit3: Tuition fees for language courses and university are fully covered (for master's and doctoral students only)...
grant.videoAlt: Video on how to get a scholarship
TOPIK academy aniq siz uchun agar siz:: TOPIK Academy is just right for you if you:
Qisqa muddat ichida Koreys tilida gapiri: Want to start speaking Korean in a short period
Koreys tili o’rganib o’z karyerangizni q: Want to learn Korean and build your career
Topik sertifikatini olib Koreyaning nufu: Want to get a TOPIK certificate and win a scholarship at prestigious Korean universities
Janubiy Koreya davlatida o’qish va ishla: Want to study and work in South Korea
Koreys tilini o’rta darajda bilasiz va d: Know Korean at an intermediate level and want to improve your level
Ko’p yillardan buyon o’qib ham natijaga: Have been studying for many years but not achieving results
Sizga 4 yildan ortiq tajriba va Topik da: Teachers with over 4 years of experience and TOPIK Level 6
Erkin dars qilish, netvorking va o’z ust: Free coworking zones for flexible study, networking, and self-development
TOPIK academy jamoasi o’quvchilari uchun: The TOPIK Academy team regularly organizes additional events for students
Har davomida tashkil etiladigan sinov im: Participate in regular mock exams to track your level
Darslarni o’zlashtirishda qiyinchilik bo: There will be a curator to help you with course materials
